Luke Shaw joins Man Utd's new summer signing on the treatment table, making the team's injury situation worse.

Football Andree · 25/08/2023 · Manchester United

Luke Shaw, who plays left back for Manchester United, is hurt in his muscles and won't be able to play for a long time.

Luke Shaw will be out for a long time, which is terrible news for Manchester United | The Sun

Even though the medical team for the Red Devils is still figuring out how bad the injury is, early estimates show that the England player will only be out for a few weeks instead of several months. Erik ten Hag, the boss, probably wasn't happy to hear the news, so he will have to use his other options.

The backup left back, Tyrell Malacia, is now getting better from an injury he got at the end of last season. He won't be able to cover for Shaw while he gets better. So, Ten Hag might have to put together a backline on the spot for some important games, like the away game against Big Six rivals Arsenal on September 3.MU went all the way with Luke ShawMason Mount, a well-known player who cost United £55 million in the summer, is also out with an illness. At first, it looked like the former Chelsea player would only be out for three weeks and could come back soon after the international break.Those hopes seem to have been shattered, as there is rising concern that Mount could miss up to six weeks of action. He would not only miss the trip to the Emirates and the league game against Nottingham Forest after that, but also United's first two group-stage Champions League games. Mount's injury might make Ten Hag want to add more choices in the middle of the field for his team, but United was already looking for another midfielder.The left back for Manchester United and England Luke Shaw can't play because he hurt a muscle | beIN SPORTSScott McTominay's future could be changed by Mount's lack of action. Teams like West Ham and Everton were interested in the United young player, so it was thought that he would leave Old Trafford this summer. United's start to the new league season hasn't been great. In their first game, they beat Wolves 1-0 at home, but in their second game, they lost 2-0 at Tottenham.The new direction for MU in working with Luke ShawIn both of those games, United's center has been a clear point of weakness. When Mount has been called in, it has been possible to solve that problem without calling on England's best player.United has a week to add any last-minute players they might need to keep up with the group in the lead.
